snippet: Facing questions about the accuracy of her comments describing undercover Planned Parenthood videos, Carly Fiorina issued a sharp defense before a conservative forum in Greenville, S.C.,
abstract: Facing questions about the accuracy of her comments describing undercover Planned Parenthood videos, Carly Fiorina issued a sharp defense before a conservative forum in Greenville, S.C.,

headline.main: Carly Fiorina Defends Her Comments on Planned Parenthood Video
